title: BCA Research Hires PGIM’s Weisberger as Chief US Equities Strategist
description: BCA Research has hired Noah Weisberger as chief US equities strategist, tapping the former managing director at PGIM’s institutional advisory unit to lead what it called a “reimagining” of its coverage of American stocks.
